about_the_game:
Step into the heart of the wild and embark on your first adventure in Wild Explorer. This demo offers a glimpse into the vast, living forest where nature thrives, secrets await discovery, and every step leads to something new.

Armed with your camera and an old journal, your mission is to observe and document the rare creatures that roam the land and the ancient monuments hidden deep within the wilderness. Every photo you take brings the journal to life, preserving the beauty and mystery of the world around you.

In this demo, you’ll explore a limited section of the forest, encounter a selection of animals and landmarks, and experience the core mechanics of the full game. Discover how time of day and weather conditions affect wildlife appearances, interact with travelers and villagers for clues, and immerse yourself in the peaceful yet thrilling experience of exploration.

This is just the beginning your full journey awaits in Wild Explorer!

name: Wild Explorer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wild Explorer Demo takes you on an adventure into the heart of nature. Photograph rare animals, complete an ancient journal, uncover mysteries, and explore the forest with dynamic weather conditions. Nature is watching—you should be too!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
